mapper.select: SELECT JP.JOB_POSTING_SEQ, JP.CORP_NO, JP.POSITION_SEQ, JP.POSTING_TITLE, JP.POSTING_DETAIL, JP.EXP_LEVEL, JP.POSTING_END_DT, JP.POSTING_START_DT, JP.RECRUIT_CNT, JP.EMPLOY_TYPE, JP.WORKDAY, JP.WORK_START_TIME, JP.WORK_END_TIME, JP.SALARY, JP.CONT_START_DT, JP.CONT_END_DT, JP.EDU_LEVEL, JP.VIEW_CNT, JP.ZIPCODE, JP.ROAD_ADDRESS, JP.DETAIL_ADDRESS, P.POSITION_NAME, C.CORP_NM, C.CORP_INFO, C.CORP_URL FROM JOB_POSTING JP JOIN COMPANY C ON JP.CORP_NO = C.CORP_NO JOIN POSITION_CODE P ON JP.POSITION_SEQ = P.POSITION_SEQ WHERE LOWER(JP.POSTING_TITLE) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{keyword}) || '%' OR LOWER(JP.POSTING_DETAIL) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{keyword}) || '%' OR LOWER(C.CORP_NM) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{keyword}) || '%'
